description:
### Square Digits Sequence

A function that accepts a positive number, n, and returns the number of times that n will need to be replaced with the sum of the squares of its digits until n has already previously appeared. The function will continue to do this until a number has already previously appeared.

Input: A single integer n.
Output: A single integer representing the number of times that n needed to be replaced until a number reappeared.

Example:

```js squareDigitsSequence(16) // 9 ```
